findings.title: Token minting.
findings.description: The functionality allows the owner to mint more than stated in tokenomics (10,000,000,000,000).

findings.title: Pausing of all the token transfers.
findings.description: The functionality allows the owner to pause all the token transfers anytime. Pausing functionality should be limited by clear contract rules. The documentation does not mention the functionality of transfers stopping.

findings.title: Functions that can be declared as external
findings.description: Specified functions can be declared as external to reduce gas usage.

findings.title: Unlocked pragma and using not latest solidity version
findings.description: Contracts with unlocked pragmas may be deployed by the latest compiler, which may have higher risks of undiscovered bugs.
